remarks: Addition formula for sine.  Equation 14 of [Gleason] p. 310.  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 10-Nov-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2014.)
statement: sinadd $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( sin ` ( A + B ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) $.
